turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks on Army Trail Road.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which coffee would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A Caffe Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like it to be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to add anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want stevia added to it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you add some whipped cream to it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, whipped cream can be added.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like that then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to add any flavors?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you'd like to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that is all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Your coffee at the Starbucks on Army Trail Road will be available for pickup shortly. The receipt will be sent to your phone via text.
